Description: Compute (squared) L2 Distances between atoms given neighbors

Combines graph convolution and aggregation for molecular encoding

Iterative refinement LSTM that modifies both test and support sets
Apply dropout based on an input
Computes a weighted linear combination of input layers with the weights defined by trainable variables
Generates Gaussian noise by combining mean and standard deviation
Stack the inputs along a new axis
Wraps a trainable variable as a Keras layer (requires a dummy input)
Computes free-energy as defined by Autodock Vina
Computes a neighbor-list in TensorFlow
Performs graph convolution on 3D molecular structures using radial symmetry functions
Part of a sluice network. Adds alpha parameters to control sharing between the main and auxiliary tasks
Calculates the loss in a Sluice Network

Performs transform from 3D coordinates to ANI symmetry functions

Creates a highway layer
